env.CONFLUENCE_URL: Insert your Confluence URL here (e.g., https://your-domain.atlassian.net/wiki)
env.CONFLUENCE_USERNAME: Insert your Confluence username here (for Cloud)
env.CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN: Insert your Confluence API token here (for Cloud)
env.CONFLUENCE_PERSONAL_TOKEN: Insert your Confluence Personal Access Token here (for Server/Data Center)
env.JIRA_URL: Insert your Jira URL here (e.g., https://your-domain.atlassian.net)
env.JIRA_USERNAME: Insert your Jira username here (for Cloud)
env.JIRA_API_TOKEN: Insert your Jira API token here (for Cloud)
env.JIRA_PERSONAL_TOKEN: Insert your Jira Personal Access Token here (for Server/Data Center)
